Andre Miller

Andre Lloyd Miller

(The Professor)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-3, 200lb (190cm, 90kg)

Born: March 19, 1976 in Los Angeles, California us

College: Utah

High School: Verbum Dei in Los Angeles, California

Draft: Cleveland Cavaliers, 1st round (8th pick, 8th overall), 1999 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 2, 1999

Career Length: 17 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Andre Miller?

Andre Miller is 48 years old.

Where was Andre Miller born?

Andre Miller was born in Los Angeles, California.

When was Andre Miller born?

Andre Miller was born on March 19, 1976.

How tall is Andre Miller?

Andre Miller is 6-3 (190 cm) tall.

How much did Andre Miller weigh when playing?

Andre Miller weighed 200 lbs (90 kg) when playing.

Is Andre Miller in the Hall of Fame?

Andre Miller is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Andre Miller drafted?

Andre Miller was drafted by Cleveland Cavaliers, 1st round (8th pick, 8th overall), 1999 NBA Draft.

What position did Andre Miller play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

When did Andre Miller retire?

Andre Miller last played in 2016.

What is Andre Miller's net worth?

Andre Miller made at least $98,114,732 playing professional basketball.

How much did Andre Miller make?

Andre Miller made $10,333,334 in 2009.

What did Andre Miller average?

Andre Miller averaged 12.5 points, 3.7 rebounds, and 6.5 assists per game.

How many rings does Andre Miller have?

Andre Miller won 0 championships.

What schools did Andre Miller attend?

Andre Miller attended Verbum Dei in Los Angeles, California and Utah.

What are Andre Miller's nicknames?

The Professor is a nickname for Andre Miller.
